page.title: 09Tourism south: FINTRY
page.content:
Overnight and longer stay is offered by both the Clachan and the Fintry Inn. Both serve midday and evening meals.
Sadly the Youth Hostel, still on some OS maps, closed recently. Visitors wishing to stay are usually accommodated by one of the several farms or private houses offering bed and breakfast.
The area has many pleasant walks, but stout footwear is usually needed. A booklet of walks is available from the Post Office etc.
The fishing is popular and licenses can be obtained for several local stretches.
